GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v6.0.7
GSD.description:
kcm: annotate data-races around kcm->rx_wait

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.7 by commit 2733fb2ad5bfbe6538f2f93a21f2504e3dba9d6a, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit ab7ac4eb9832e32a09f4e8042705484d2fb0aad3. For more details please see the references link.
